name: Money Rush (itch) (Jovvy2003)
description:
This is our participation to the event known as games jam and we  produce to you ''Money Rush''  a game where you play as a the man Ross Haurer a busy business tycoon in the big city trying to make it big with the time he has at his disposal. 

Team Roles: 

Joey: Project lead, Game and Art Designer and overall quality management, Minor Dev.

Luke: Major Mechanic and Program Dev.

Lewis: Sound and level design.
